message.skylands.island_create.success: Your Island got successfully created, you can now visit it with the <color:#3fd9ff>/sl home <color:#98f9ff>command!
message.skylands.island_delete.warning: Are you sure that you want to delete your Island? It can't be rolled back even with all might and determination! Type <color:#3fd9ff>/sl delete CONFIRM <color:#98f9ff>to continue.
message.skylands.force_delete.fail: <color:#ff816a>%player% does not have an Island yet!
message.skylands.hub_pos_change: Position of the hub got changed to <color:#3fd9ff>%pos%
message.skylands.invite_member.already_m: This player is already member of your Island!
message.skylands.invite_member.already_i: You have already invited this player!
message.skylands.invite_member.success: <color:#3fd9ff>%newcomer% <color:#98f9ff>got successfully invited! They got 5 minutes to accept your invite.
hover_event.skylands.invite_member.accep: Click here to accept this invite or type <color:#98f9ff>/sl accept %inviter% <r>command.
message.skylands.accept.no_island: This player does not have an Island yet.
message.skylands.accept.fail: This player did not invite you.
message.skylands.accept.success: You successfully accepted <color:#3fd9ff>%owner%'s <color:#98f9ff>invite! You can now visit the Island with <color:#3fd9ff>/sl home %owner% <color:#98f9ff>command.
message.skylands.remove_member.not_membe: This player is not member of your Island.
message.skylands.kick_visitor.member: You can't kick member of your Island.
message.skylands.ban_player.member: You can't ban member of your Island.
message.skylands.visit_home.not_member: You are not member of this Island.
message.skylands.visit_home.no_island: <color:#ff816a>This player doesn't have an Island yet!
message.skylands.home.fail: You are already on your Island!
message.skylands.world_protection.block_: You can't break blocks out here!
You can't place blocks out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.bucket: You can't use bucket out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.bone_m: You can't use bone meal out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.axe_us: You can't modify blocks out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.barrel: You can't open barrels out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.chest_: You can't open chests out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.item_p: You can't place items out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.door_o: You can't interact with doors out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.farmla: You can't spoil farmlands out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.fence_: You can't interact with fence gates out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.flint_: You can't place fire out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.flower: You can't interact with flower pots out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.furnac: You can't open furnaces out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.hoe_us: You can't modify blocks out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.hopper: You can't open hoppers out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.item_f: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.entity: You can't damage entities out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.damage: You can't take damage out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.shovel: You can't modify blocks out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.shulke: You can't open shulker boxes out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.mineca: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.skylands.world_protection.villag: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.skylands.help.4: - <color:#98f9ff>/sl home <player> <r>-> Teleport to an Island you are member of.
message.skylands.help.5: - <color:#98f9ff>/sl members invite <player> <r>-> Invite player to your Island.
message.skylands.help.6: - <color:#98f9ff>/sl members remove <player> <r>-> Remove player from your Island.
message.skylands.help.7: - <color:#98f9ff>/sl accept <player> <r>-> Accept Island join invite request.
message.skylands.help.8: - <color:#98f9ff>/sl kick <player> <r>-> Kick player from your Island.
message.skylands.help.9: - <color:#98f9ff>/sl ban <player> <r>-> Ban player from visiting your Island.
message.skylands.help.10: - <color:#98f9ff>/sl unban <player> <r>-> Unban player to allow visiting your Island.
